channel.title: Service Desk on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Service Desk on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Axios Systems Logo Axios Systems is a provider of Service Desk, IT Service Management and IT Asset Management software. The assyst enterprise application suite was the first to support ITIL best practices. The company has a customer base from the Fortune 50, Fortune 500 and Fortune 1000 lists. Worldwide, Axios Systems has more than 1,000 customers and typically targets organisations with at least 1,000 IT users. Source
You can download theAxioslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Axios
item.description: Axios Systems is a provider of Service Desk, IT Service Management and IT Asset Management software. The assyst enterprise application suite was the first to support ITIL best practices. The company has a customer base from the Fortune 50, Fortune 500 and Fortune 1000 lists. Worldwide, Axios Systems has more than 1,000 customers and typically targets organisations with at least 1,000 IT users. Source
